faq.question: How do I use my Palm Beach Pass?
faq.answer: Simply show your digital QR code at any participating attraction entrance. Your pass is activated on first use and remains valid for the duration purchased.

faq.question: Can I share my pass with others?
faq.answer: Each pass is for individual use only. However, you can purchase multiple passes during checkout for your family or group.

faq.question: What if an attraction is closed?
faq.answer: Attraction closures don't affect your pass validity. You can visit alternative attractions or contact our customer service for assistance.

faq.question: Is transportation included?
faq.answer: Transportation shuttles are included with 5-day and 7-day passes. Other passes receive discounts on local transportation partners.

faq.question: Can I upgrade my pass?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to a longer duration pass by paying the difference. Contact customer service or visit any participating attraction.
